generation.subject: Indian model in traditional Banarasi silk saree

prompt.full_text: Professional editorial fashion photograph of an elegant Indian model wearing a traditional Banarasi silk saree. The saree features intricate gold zari brocade work with ornate floral and paisley motifs characteristic of Varanasi craftsmanship. Rich deep red or royal blue silk fabric with shimmering golden thread embroidery. The model has graceful posture, standing in a classic three-quarter pose that showcases the saree's beautiful draping and pallu (draped end piece) over her shoulder. Natural, warm studio lighting that highlights the luxurious silk texture and metallic zari work. The model wears traditional jewelry - jhumka earrings and bangles. Clean, minimal background in warm neutral tones that complements the saree without distraction. Professional photography with sharp focus on fabric details, soft bokeh background. Captured with the quality of a high-end fashion editorial shoot. The overall aesthetic balances traditional Indian heritage with contemporary elegance.
key_elements: Banarasi silk saree with gold zari brocade
Navy blue saree with golden embroidery
